mapper.insert: insert into lagarto.auction (icategory, title, ctnt, iuser, price) values (#{icategory}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser}, #{price})
mapper.select: select A.*, B.nm as writernm From lagarto.auction A Left join lagarto.lagarto_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser where A.isdel = 0 Order by A.iboard DESC LIMIT 1
